name: Forestation
description: Grow green forests by drawing a continuous line through all the cells in each level. Sophisticated levels and sudden secrets await you in this puzzle that could seem simple at first impression!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024MB + DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card capable of stereo output
